text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 8px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 4px;

g.text: an open source platform for made-to-measure sewing patterns

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 4px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px;

g.text: This is the freesewing.org home page.

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px;

g.text: I mean, it is obviously not because this is just some animation, but hopefully you get the point.

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px;

g.text: If you're new here, take the tour.

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px; font-weight: bold;

g.text: Pool party blog post is up

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 6px;

g.text: Check out the pool party blog post.

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 11px;

g.text: To create an account, enter your email address, and pick a password

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #999; font-size: 12px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #999; font-size: 12px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #999; font-size: 8px;

g.text: 1) We'll never share your email with anyone else

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #999; font-size: 8px;

g.text: 2) We don't enforce a password policy

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 12px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 12px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 12px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold;

g.text: Great, now go check your inbox

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 12px;

g.text: Weve sent you an email with a link to confirm your account. Go ahead and click that link, Ill wait.

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 5px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 4px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 4px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 4px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 4px; font-weight: bold;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 10px;
font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #292b2c; font-size: 5px;

g.text: Thank you for signing up. Before we get started, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below:

text.style: font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; fill: #fff; font-size: 6px;
